newsletter.unsubscribed_message: You will no longer receive marketing emails from {store_name}

product.add_to_cart: Proceed to Checkout in order to submit RFQ

product.success_cart: *product* has been successfully added to your cart. *cart_link* or *checkout_link*.

reviews.no_reviews: Be the first to review this product.

wishlist.add_success: *product* successfully added to wishlist. View wishlist.
wishlist.add_error: *product* could not be added to wishlist.

rss.heading: RSS Syndication
rss.intro: RSS feeds are used for syndicating regularly changing content on a web site, including this one. You can open an RSS feed using an RSS reader and use it to see if there is any new content on this site or you can set up a server-side script to parse the feed and display it on your web site.

blog.heading: Recent Blog Posts
blog.intro: The recent post feed contains the latest {limit} blog posts published on {store}.

products_new.heading: New Products
products_new.intro: The latest products feed contains the latest {limit} products added to {store}.

products_popular.heading: Popular Products
products_popular.intro: The popular products feed contains the top {limit} most popular products on {store} as rated by users.

products_featured.heading: Featured Products
products_featured.intro: The featured products feed contains the latest {limit} featured products on {store}.

search.heading: Product Searches
search.intro1: Product search feeds allow you to save your custom product searches as syndication feed that will always update when there are new results.
search.intro2: To create a product search feed, perform a standard search on {store} and at the bottom of the page click on one of the syndication options.

search.title: Search Results for
search.no_results: No results were found. Please try searching again.

e403.title: Forbidden
e403.message: You do not have permission to access this page.

e404.title: Page not found
e404.message: Uh oh, looks like the page you are looking for has moved or no longer exists.

e500.title: Server error
e500.message: Store is currently unavailable, please try again in a few minutes.

generic.title: Something went wrong
generic.message: Sorry, something went wrong when attempting to build this page. Please try again later.

hibernation.heading: We'll be back
hibernation.message: Thanks for visiting. Our store is currently unavailable. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

maintenance.heading: Down for Maintenance
maintenance.message: This store is currently unavailable due to maintenance. It should be available again shortly. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

validation.email: Your E-mail address appears to be invalid.
validation.number: You can enter only numbers in this field.
validation.num_max: Please enter a number less than {max}.
validation.num_min: Please enter a number greater than {min}.
validation.num_range: Please enter a number greater than {min} and less than {max}.
validation.different: Fields cannot be the same as each other.
validation.terms_agree: You must agree to these terms before continuing.

add.heading: Add New Address
add.description: Use the form below to change any/all details of your shipping address. Click the 'Save Address' button when you are done.

order_complete.heading: Order Complete
order_complete.message: Your order is complete. Thanks for shopping with us!

header.store_credit: You have {store_credit} of store credit. To use it, simply place your order and you will be able to choose store credit as the payment method when it comes time to pay for your order.

contact.question: Comments/Questions
contact.successful: We've received your feedback and will respond shortly if required. Continue.

purchase.heading: Purchase Gift Certificate
purchase.subheading: This gift certificate will be emailed to the recipient after your order has been paid for.
purchase.agree: I understand that Gift Certificates expire after {days, plural, one {1 day} other {# days}}
purchase.agree2: I agree that Gift Certificates are nonrefundable

balance.heading: Check Gift Certificate Balance
balance.subheading: You can check the balance of a gift certificate by typing the code in to the box below.

redeem.heading: Redeem Gift Certificate
redeem.subheading: To redeem a gift certificate at {store_name}, follow the simple steps below.
redeem.item1: You need your unique gift certificate code, which is part of the gift certificate that was emailed to you as an attachment. It will look something like Z50-Y6K-COS-402.
redeem.item2: Browse the store and add items to your cart as you normally would.
redeem.item3: Click the 'View Cart' link to view the contents of your shopping cart.
redeem.item4: Type your gift certificate code in to the 'Redeem Gift Certificate' box and click 'Go'.

common.store_credit: You have {store_credit} of store credit. To use it, simply place your order and you will be able to choose store credit as the payment method when it comes time to pay for your order.

receipt.heading: Order #{number}
receipt.ship_to_multi_text: Order will be shipped to multiple addresses.

return.heading: Return Items from Order #{id}
return.empty: This order contains no products that can be returned. Have you already returned all of the items within this order?

items.description: {num_products, plural, one {1 item} other {# items}} totaling {cost}
items.empty: You haven't placed any orders yet.

addresses.heading: Addresses
addresses.no_addresses: You currently have no addresses added to your profile

wishlists.heading: Wishlists
wishlists.details_empty: There are no items in this wishlist.

recent_items.heading: Recently Viewed
recent_items.empty: You haven't viewed any items recently.

returns.heading: Returns
returns.successful: Your return was submitted successfully. We'll respond as soon as we can.
returns.no_returns: You haven't made any returns yet.

messages.heading: Messages
messages.no_messages: You have no messages at this time.

create_form.heading: New Customer
create_form.intro: Create an account with us and you'll be able to:
create_form.fact_wishlist: Save items to your wish list

created.heading: Account Created
created.message: Your {store_name} account was created with the email address: {email}

forgot.heading: Forgot Password
forgot.message: Fill in your email below to request a new password. An email will be sent to the address below containing a link to verify your email address.

unavailable.maintenance_message: This store is currently unavailable due to maintenance. It should be available again shortly. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
unavailable.hibernation_message: Thanks for visiting. Our store is currently unavailable. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

forms.password_length: Your password must be at least {min_length} characters long
forms.max_checked: Maximum {count, plural, one {1 option} other {# options}} allowed.
forms.min_checked: Please select {count, plural, one {an option} other {# or more options}}.

geotrust.click_to_verify: Click to Verify - This site chose GeoTrust SSL for secure e-commerce and confidential communications.

address.address_not_recognized_heading: We did not recognize your address
address.confirm_address_text: We could not find a match for the address you entered. Please confirm the address.

billing.save_billing_address_error: An error occurred while saving the billing address to your price quote. Please try again.
billing.use_shipping_address_label: My Billing address is the same as my Shipping address

common.leave_warning: Are you sure you want to leave? Data you have entered may not be saved.
common.unavailable_error: Checkout is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

customer.checkout_as_guest_text: Checking out as a Guest? You'll be able to save your details to create an account with us later.
customer.create_account_error: An error occurred while creating your account. Please try again.
customer.create_account_text: Create an account for a faster checkout in the future
customer.create_account_to_continue_text: Don’t have an account? Create an account to continue.
customer.password_letter_required_error: Password needs to contain a letter
customer.password_number_required_error: Password needs to contain a number
customer.sign_in_error: The email or password you entered is not valid.
customer.sign_in_throttled_error: Due to excessive login attempts, please wait 10 seconds before attempting to log in again.
customer.sign_out_error: An error occurred while signing out. Please try again.
customer.subscribe_to_newsletter_text: Yes, I'd like to receive updates.

payment.credit_card_expiration_invalid_error: Expiration date must be a valid future date in MM / YY format
payment.credit_card_cvv_help_text: For VISA and Mastercard, the CVV is a three-digit code printed on the back. For American Express it is the four-digit code printed on the front. The CVV is a security measure to ensure that you are in possession of the card.
payment.credit_card_number_invalid_error: Credit Card Number must be valid
payment.payment_error: An error occurred while processing your payment. Please try again.
payment.payment_heading: Grand Total to be Provided (email confirmation to follow)
payment.payment_method_disabled_error: The selected payment method is no longer valid. Click OK to see the most up-to-date payment methods.
payment.payment_method_invalid_error: There's a problem processing your payment from this store. Please contact the seller for assistance or choose another payment method.
payment.payment_method_unavailable_error: This payment provider is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
payment.payment_not_required_text: Payment is not required for this order.
payment.place_order_error: There was an error placing your order. Please contact us.

redeemable.code_required_error: Please enter a gift certificate or coupon code
redeemable.store_credit_available_text: Your account currently has {storeCredit} total store credit available

remote.browser_unsupported: The selected payment method requires a different web browser. Please choose another payment method.
remote.connection_error: Connection to remote checkout refused, please try later.
remote.payment_method_error: There was an error retrieving your remote payment method. Please try again.
remote.session_error: Your remote session has expired. Please log in again.
remote.shipping_address_error: There was an error retrieving your remote shipping address. Please try again.
remote.sign_in_required_error: Remote sign in required before payment

shipping.save_shipping_option_error: An error occurred while saving the shipping quote to your order. Please try again.
shipping.select_shipping_address_text: Please select a shipping address in order to see shipping quotes
shipping.shipping_option_expired_error: The shipping price you were quoted is no longer valid. Click OK to see the most up-to-date shipping prices.
shipping.shipping_option_expired_heading: Your shipping price has been updated

social.share_heading: Tell your friends about your purchase!

terms_and_conditions.agreement_required_error: Please agree to the terms and conditions
terms_and_conditions.agreement_text: Yes, I agree with the above terms and conditions
terms_and_conditions.agreement_with_link_text: Yes, I agree with the terms and conditions

order_confirmation.order_pending_review_text: Your order was sent to us but is currently awaiting payment. Once we receive the payment for your order, it will be completed. If you've already provided payment details then we will process your order manually and send you an email when it's completed.
order_confirmation.order_with_downloadable_digital_items_te: You can download your digital purchases by clicking the links on this page, or by logging into your account at any time. There is also a download link in your confirmation email, which should be arriving shortly.
order_confirmation.order_with_support_number_text: You will receive an order confirmation within one business day. If you have any questions about your purchase, email us at {supportEmail} or call us at {supportPhoneNumber}.
order_confirmation.order_without_downloadable_digital_items: Once we receive your payment, we’ll send a confirmation email with a link to download your digital purchases.
order_confirmation.order_without_support_number_text: An email will be sent containing information about your purchase. If you have any questions about your purchase, email us at {supportEmail}.
order_confirmation.order_status_update_facebook_messenger_h: Get instant updates of your order to Messenger
